publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-2711 Hugh Henry: Oil Pricesâ€”That the Parliament calls on the oil companies to pass on to consumers immediately decreases in the price of oil; notes how quickly increases in prices are passed on to consumers as the world price of oil goes up, and believes that consumers should benefit as soon as possible as a result of the drop in price of oil.
S3M-2711 Oil Prices (lodged on 13 October 2008) Jamie Hepburn*
S3M-2711 Oil Prices (lodged on 13 October 2008) Tom McCabe*
S3M-2711 Oil Prices (lodged on 13 October 2008) Peter Peacock*
S3M-2711 Oil Prices (lodged on 13 October 2008) David Stewart*, Rhoda Grant*

S3M-2711 Oil Prices (lodged on 13 October 2008) Ken Macintosh*, Cathy Jamieson*, Cathie Craigie*, Mary Mulligan*, Mr Frank McAveety*
S3M-2711 Oil Prices (lodged on 13 October 2008) Pauline McNeill*, Trish Godman*
S3M-2711 Oil Prices (lodged on 13 October 2008) Gil Paterson*
S3M-2711 Oil Prices (lodged on 13 October 2008) Angela Constance*
